doc:
Robert Colbert https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Colbert 0 Robert Colbert (born July 26, 1931) is an American actor most noted for his leading role portraying Dr. Doug Phillips on the ABC television series The Time Tunnel and his two appearances as Brent Maverick, a third Maverick brother in the ABC/Warner Brothers western, Maverick starring James Garner, Jack Kelly and Roger Moore. Robert_Colbert ( born July_26_,_1931 ) is an_American_actor most_noted for his_leading_role portraying Dr._Doug_Phillips on the_ABC_television_series The_Time_Tunnel and his_two_appearances as Brent_Maverick , a_third_Maverick_brother in the_ABC/Warner_Brothers_western , Maverick starring James_Garner , Jack_Kelly and Roger_Moore .
